channel.title: Extra LLP up for trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Extra LLP up for trade" - Love Love paradise - double friend points

item.title: Re: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded: Oh, huhâ€¦ okay then nevermind. Thanks anyway :). But yeah, for future reference you need an extra of any permanent to trade it/put it in your bucket/put it in the storehouse.

item.title: Re: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded: Another edit: I don't have a second Codec and I didn't know you need two to trade a Codec.

item.title: Re: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded: Edit: It won't allow me to trade my codec OR put it in my bucket.

item.title: Re: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded: We'll try today on Saturday and if not then on Tuesday.

item.title: Re: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded: Sunday doesn't work for me too well. Just want to find a common date because otherwise we'd waste the spray (and ryo) trying to trade since it only lasts the day. Maybe tuesday then?

item.title: Re: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded: I'll try on Saturday, but it'll probably end up being on Sunday or Tuesday, okie?

item.title: Re: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded: Still have it and would be glad to trade. I'm going to be busy tomorrow for a large part so could we trade on Saturday? Just use an avian attraction spray saturday and I'll do the same, but I suppose it'd be best if you posted here beforehand to verify just in case you changed your mind.

item.title: Re: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded: I'll trade a Codec for it unless you don't have it any more; my username is Soiuku of Watermelon Village.

item.title: Re: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded: er, that up there was me, my name in-game is moodragonx :). Please post if you're interested :D

item.title: Extra LLP up for trade
item.content:encoded:
Hey there, I'm looking to trade this Love Love Paradise.

I have all super-rares from the party house, except for the codec. I'm hoping to get one but, I'm also very open to other offers such as low value monster items. In addition I'd be willing to consider adding a ninja dog and/or puppet if it'll entice offers.

I'd also consider offers of fireworks launchers and/or dessert robes, but I'd really rather not bother with the robes because my village will be getting the sand trading post soon enough. Though the launcher would be considered.
